Config Object.name: draggable
desc: If true, pieces on the board are draggable to other squares.

Config Object.name: dropOffBoard
desc: If 'snapback', pieces dropped off the board will return to their original square.
If 'trash', pieces dropped off the board will be removed from the board.
This property has no effect when draggable is false.

Config Object.name: position
desc: If provided, sets the initial position of the board.

Config Object.name: orientation
desc: If provided, sets the orientation of the board.

Config Object.name: showNotation
desc: Turn board notation on or off.

Config Object.name: sparePieces
desc: If true, the board will have spare pieces that can be dropped onto the board.
If sparePieces is set to true, draggable gets set to true as well.

Config Object.name: showErrors
desc: showErrors is an optional parameter to control how AutoComplete reports errors.
Every error in AutoComplete has a unique code to help diagnose problems and search for solutions.
If showErrors is false then errors will be ignored.
If showErrors is 'console' then errors will be sent to console.log().
If showErrors is 'alert' then errors will be sent to window.alert().
If showErrors is a function then the first argument is the unique error code, the second argument is an error string, and an optional third argument is a data structure that is relevant to the error.

Config Object.name: pieceTheme
desc: A template string used to determine the source of piece images.
If pieceTheme is a function the first argument is the piece code.
The function should return an <img> source.

Config Object.name: moveSpeed
desc: Animation speed for when pieces move between squares or from spare pieces to the board.

Config Object.name: snapbackSpeed
desc: Animation speed for when pieces that were dropped outside the board return to their original square.

Config Object.name: snapSpeed
desc: Animation speed for when pieces "snap" to a square when dropped.

Config Object.name: trashSpeed
desc: Animation speed for when pieces are removed.

Methods.name: clear(useAnimation)
desc: Removes all the pieces on the board.
If useAnimation is false, removes pieces instantly.
Alias of position({}) and position({}, false)

Methods.name: destroy()
Methods.desc: Remove the widget from the DOM.

Methods.name: fen()
desc: Returns the current position as a FEN string.
Alias of position('fen')

Methods.name: flip()
desc: Flips the board orientation.
Alias of orientation('flip')

Methods.name: move(move1, move2, etc)
desc: Executes one or more moves on the board.
Returns an updated Position Object of the board including the move(s).

Methods.name: position(fen)
desc: Returns the current position as a Position Object.
If the first argument is 'fen', returns the position as a FEN string.

Methods.name: position(newPosition, useAnimation)
args: Position Object, FEN string, or 'start'
desc: Animates to a new position.
If useAnimation is false, sets the position instantly.

Methods.name: orientation()
desc: Returns the current orientation of the board.

Methods.name: orientation(arg)
args: 'white', 'black', or 'flip'
desc: If 'white' or 'black', sets the orientation of the board accordingly.
If 'flip', flips the orientation.

Methods.name: resize()
desc: Recalculates board and square sizes based on the parent element and redraws the board accordingly.

Methods.name: start()
desc: Sets the board to the start position.
Alias of position('start')

Errors.desc: The first argument to ChessBoard() cannot be an empty string.
Errors.fix: The first argument to the ChessBoard() constructor should be the id of a DOM element or a reference to a single DOM element.

Errors.desc: Element with id "<id>" does not exist in the DOM.
fix: ChessBoard could not find your element with document.getElementById.
Please note that if you pass a string as the first argument to the ChessBoard() constructor it should be the value of a DOM id, not a CSS selector (ie: "board", not "#board").

Errors.desc: The first argument to ChessBoard() must be an ID or a single DOM node.
Errors.fix: The first argument to the ChessBoard() constructor should be the id of a DOM element or a reference to a single DOM element.

Errors.desc: JSON does not exist. Please include a JSON polyfill.
Errors.fix: ChessBoard requires a JSON implementation. Please include a polyfill for older browsers.

Errors.desc: Unable to find a valid version of jQuery. Please include jQuery 1.7.0 or higher on the page.
Errors.fix: ChessBoard requires jQuery version 1.7.0 or higher.

Errors.desc: Invalid move passed to the move method.
Errors.fix: Moves must be a string in the form of 'e2-e4', 'b8-c6', etc.

Errors.desc: Invalid value passed to the orientation method.
Errors.fix: The first argument to the orientation method must be 'white', 'black', or 'flip'.

Errors.desc: Invalid value passed to the position method.
Errors.fix: Position must be either 'start', a valid FEN String, or a valid Position Object.
Position must either be 'start', a valid FEN String, or a Position Object.
